text: The 1905–06 international cricket season was from September 1905 to April 1906. The season consists with a single international tour. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | | | |4–1 [5] |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text- align:center"| — |} ==January== ===England in South Africa=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="9"|Test series |- ! title: International cricket in 1905–06
